objectives.performance: Migrate GF(256) math to WASM and implement multi-threaded decoding.
objectives.scalability: Dynamic worker pool sizing based on hardware concurrency.
objectives.networking: Replace simulation with UDP/IP sockets using dgram.
objectives.streaming: Refactor Encoder/Decoder to support Node.js Streams (Backpressure).
